summary: A simple mod that makes a few changes to the Thieve's Guild members Vex and Tonilia. No other mods required.
descriptionHtml:
[center]

[img]http://i209.photobucket.com/albums/bb281/Syn_gaia/Skyrim/VexandTon_zps5bb9b04b.jpg[/img]

[color=royalblue][size=7][U][B]Vex and Tonilia Overhaul[/B][/U][/SIZE][/Color]

Have you ever looked at NPCs and thought that their appearance just didn't fit? I'm sure we all have. So I started a new game, joined the Thieve's Guild and realized that I just didn't like the looks of Vex or Tonilia much. I searched Nexus for a mod that changed that, but didn't come across one I favored. I wanted to fix that and this is what I came up with.

[color=royalblue][size=5][B]Vex[/B][/SIZE][/Color]

Spicy, sassy, and sometimes mean, Vex needed an appearance that suited her personality. She is also stealthy and a master at blending in with the shadows. This is suited to my personal likings and I hope you guys will like her too.

[img]http://i209.photobucket.com/albums/bb281/Syn_gaia/Skyrim/Vex_zps0a27912d.jpg[/img]

[color=royalblue][size=5][B]Tonilia[/B][/SIZE][/Color]

Pretty much that same as Vex, except she is a fence. She will sell and buy stolen goods, is tough, and has an attitude to match.

[img]http://i209.photobucket.com/albums/bb281/Syn_gaia/Skyrim/ca98114c-47d3-40ae-b0d2-12d1e3e62e27_zps2ca74820.jpg[/img]


[color=royalblue][size=6][B][U]About their looks[/U][/B][/SIZE][/Color]

The changes made to them are few, yet drastic. Their eyes, lips, and facial structure have been altered. Their hair is standalone (Apachii), but I didn't make any changes to their skin textures, makeup, body, ect. Why? Because everyone has their own preferences for those types of things. Some like CBBE, Better Females, ect.

I use the mods Coverwomen, UNP and Long Eyelashes.

Now added pictures of what they will look like for those who use SG Skin Texture Renewal as their skin textures!

If requests come in for a complete standalone version that makes such changes to them, I may consider uploading those versions. (For example I would make standalone versions of them that use UNP body and coverwomen instead of your default mods.)

[color=red]No other mods are needed for this.[/Color]

Recommended Mods but not Required:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]Apachii Sky Hair[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3563/?]Coverwomen[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]Eyes of Beauty[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Texture Renewal[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27783/?]Long Eye Lashes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP Dimonized Body[/url]


[B][U]Credits:[/U][/B]

Apachii Hair: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?
Coverwomen: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3563/?
UNP Body (Adult Content): http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?
Long Eyelashes: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27783/?
[/center]
author: Fatal Syn
